explains: adj. 着迷的，迷恋的；缠住不放的，萦绕心头的；易受困扰的，易着迷的
n. 强迫症患者，着迷的人

sentences.en: Her ideas seem common sense but nevertheless require you to be at least slightly obsessive.
sentences.cn: 她的想法似乎是常识，但你至少要有点着迷。

sentences.en: Williams is obsessive about motor racing.
Some people are obsessive about cleanliness.
